data.name: HelpMessage
data.value:
Hi!, I'm Steward, i try to help you to get answers for some of the issues and queries that you have for the help desk,
you can ask me questions like: where to download Eikon? etc.
you can get more information @ [Steward Help](#https://thehub.thomsonreuters.com/docs/DOC-2145793)

data.name: NoneIntent
data.value: Sorry I did not understand: you can ask me questions like: where to download Eikon? etc. you can always enter **Help** to get more info.

data.name: NotFoundInKb
data.value: Sorry, I wasn't able to find anything in the Knowledge Base. I've made a note and will try to get this added moving forwards.

data.name: PromptRating
data.value:
# Thanks for your feedback.
Please rate this service between 1 to 5, 1 being unsatisfactory, 5 being excellent

data.name: ThanksMessage
data.value: Thank you. You are always welcome

data.name: TRAddInDisabledInactive
data.value:
# Please check if the "Thomson Reuters" AddIn is disabled or deactivated
*To check please follow the steps:* 1. Go to File -> Excel Options -> Add-ins 2. Check if "Thomson Reuters Eikon - Microsoft Office" appears in; - Disabled Application Add-ins - Inactive Application Add-ins
**Does it appear under disabled or deactivated?**

data.name: TRAddinUAC
data.value:
# Is there the "User Account Control (UAC)" pop up when Open Excel?
*Please follow these steps to Unchecked Privilege Level (Run as Administrator) in case of UAC pop-up*
Unchecked Privilege Level: 1. Go to the part of MS Office in Program File (e.g. "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\Office14") 2. Find "EXCEL.EXE" 3. Right-click on it and select "Properties" 4. Go to tab "Compatibility" and untick "Run this program as an administrtor"
*Once repair is done* ->**Does these steps resolve the issue?**

data.name: TRAdinConfigureManual
data.value:
*Manually add TR Office add-in:* 1. Go to File -> Excel Options -> Add-ins 2. Select to manage "COM Add-in" 3. Click "Add..." and go to Eikon folder; "C:\Program Files (x86)\Thomson Reuters\Eikon" 4. Add "EikonOfficeShim.dll"
*Once the configuration is done*-> **Did this solve the issue?**

data.name: TRAdinEnable
data.value:
**Enable Add-in:** 1. Go to File -> Excel Options -> Add-ins - If Disabled - Select to manage "Disable Items" - IF Inactive - Select to manage "COM Add-in" 2. Enable "Thomson Reuters Eikon - Microsoft Office" Add-in
*Once the above steps are followed* -> **Did this solve the issue?**

data.name: TRMissingMenu
data.value: **Is TR Ribbon incomplete?** *(missing buttons, #NAME? for functions)?*

data.name: TRReInstall
data.value:
Please go ahead and **Reinstall MS Office and Eikon.**
*Once you are through reinstalling*-> **Did that work?**

data.name: TRRepair
data.value:
Run **"Repair"** for MS Office via Control Panel.
*Once repair is done* -> tell us if that worked?

data.name: TRTabAppear
data.value: Does **"Thomson Reuters"** tab appear in the menu bar?

data.name: TRTechSupportMandatory
data.value:
#Please contact Technical Support and do remember to have following list handy:
**Mandatory details:** 1. Clear problem statement 2. Customer Eikon UUID 3. Reproduction steps
*Logs to be collected:* 1. Eikon Office Logs: Verbose 2. Dump Configuration 3. Procmon logs 4. Screenshot of issue 5. VDO recording (optional)

data.name: AskForFeedbackMessage
data.value:
If you would like to give us the feedback, please type **Feedback** then follow with your feedback
Remember you can always ask me new queries at any time.

data.name: SorryMessage
data.value:
I'm sorry to hear that. Would you mind providing your feedback so I can answer your question in future?
Please type **Feedback** then follow with your feedback. Thank you!
Remember you can always ask me new queries at any time.
